moves.name: Zap Cannon
moves.description: The user fires an electric blast like a cannon to inflict damage and cause paralysis.

moves.name: Tri Attack
moves.description: The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack. May also burn, freeze, or leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Tackle
moves.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

moves.name: Supersonic
moves.description: The user generates odd sound waves from its body. It may confuse the target.

moves.name: Thunder Shock
moves.description: A jolt of electricity is hurled at the target to inflict damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Sonic Boom
moves.description: The target is hit with a destructive shock wave that always inflicts 20 HP damage.

moves.name: Supersonic
moves.description: The user generates odd sound waves from its body. It may confuse the target.

moves.name: Thunder Shock
moves.description: A jolt of electricity is hurled at the target to inflict damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Electric Terrain
moves.description: The user electrifies the ground under everyone's feet for five turns.  Pokémon on the ground no longer fall asleep.

moves.name: Thunder Wave
moves.description: A weak electric charge is launched at the target. It causes paralysis if it hits.

moves.name: Magnet Bomb
moves.description: The user launches steel bombs that stick to the target. This attack will not miss.

moves.name: Spark
moves.description: The user throws an electrically charged tackle at the target. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Mirror Shot
moves.description: The user looses a flash of energy at the target from its polished body. It may also lower the target's accuracy.

moves.name: Metal Sound
moves.description: A horrible sound like scraping metal harshly reduces the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Electro Ball
moves.description: The user hurls an electric orb at the target. The faster the user is than the target, the greater the damage.

moves.name: Flash Cannon
moves.description: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it at once. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Screech
moves.description: An earsplitting screech harshly reduces the target's Defense stat.

moves.name: Discharge
moves.description: A flare of electricity is loosed to strike the area around the user. It may also cause paralysis.

moves.name: Lock-On
moves.description: The user takes sure aim at the target. It ensures the next attack does not fail to hit the target.

moves.name: Magnet Rise
moves.description: The user levitates using electrically generated magnetism for five turns.

moves.name: Gyro Ball
moves.description: The user tackles the target with a high-speed spin. The slower the user, the greater the damage.

moves.name: Zap Cannon
moves.description: The user fires an electric blast like a cannon to inflict damage and cause paralysis.
